idea:
Foxride Technologies provides custom IT Support Services and Solutions to allow organizations to focus on their core business. 


The Company possesses expertise in enterprise architecture and high availability, infrastructure optimization, storage and Resource management and business continuity; and provides Industry-specific software, services and expertise to the retail and hospitality markets. Headquartered in Mumbai, Foxride Technologies operates extensively in India.

idea: Onelife is built on the vision of enabling all to live their life, in a right way. Onelife’s focus is to empower everyone to lead a healthy life- body and mind.
